author: Xbox
description:
Introducing the new Designed for Xbox Floral Collection where gaming meets the delicate beauty of nature. This beautiful collection is made for players who are looking to enhance their gaming setup, combining beauty and functionality. Each piece in this collection is adorned with unique intricate floral patterns, bringing a touch of elegance to your gaming experience.

Game in full bloom, explore the collection today at Bestbuy.com: 
https://www.bestbuy.com/site/clp-video-games/design-for-xbox-summer-floral-collection/pcmcat1745257948062.c?id=pcmcat1745257948062

author: Xbox
description:
An Era built for peace and tranquility is destined to fester with Khaos and deception.
Experience the ultimate version of Liu Kang’s New Era with the Mortal Kombat 1: Definitive Edition, available now.
New Movie Skins also available today.

It's In Our Blood. Discover a reborn Mortal Kombat Universe created by Fire God Liu Kang.
Mortal Kombat 1 ushers in a New Era of the iconic franchise with a new fighting system, game modes, and Fatalities!

#MK1 #MortalKombat #DefinitiveEdition

author: Xbox
description:
The Sinking City Remastered is out now on Xbox X|S! Fully rebuilt in Unreal Engine 5 to deliver the ultimate Lovecraftian experience!

Available for free for all existing owners of The Sinking City on Xbox X|S as a thank you for your ongoing support of Frogwares.

Dive into The Sinking City, an adventure and investigation game set in an open world inspired by the universe of H.P. Lovecraft, the master of Horror. The half-submerged city of Oakmont is gripped by supernatural forces. You're a private investigator, and you have to uncover the truth of what has possessed the city… and the minds of its inhabitants.

author: Xbox
description:
Season 8 has arrived in New World: Aeternum!

Discover new battlegrounds with the Coral Divide Outpost Rush map, jump into the fast-paced action of our Capture the Flag preview events, and unlock powerful seasonal rewards. Whether you’re a seasoned warrior or returning adventurer, there’s never been a better time to fight for your legacy.

What’s New in Season 8:
New Outpost Rush map: Coral Divide
New Capture the Flag PvP mode preview events
Expeditions Unleashed
Seasonal Reward Track updates
Exclusive new cosmetics and gear

Play New World: Aeternum Now!
https://www.xbox.com/games/new-world-aeternum?msockid=26b44a258ed46393211d5f858f6e6251

author: Xbox
description:
Venture through the Labyrinth Of The Demon King, solving puzzles and fighting fearsome monsters in an epic quest to track down the demon who betrayed your lord and end its life. 

Will you have the skill, resources and stamina needed to survive through all the horrors this brutal world will throw at you? Out now on Xbox One & Xbox Series X|S.

author: Xbox
description:
The Precinct is coming to Xbox Series X|S on May 13 2025. Clean up the mean streets of Averno City, uncover the truth about your father's murder, and embark on thrilling vehicle chases through destructible environments in this neon-noir action sandbox police sim.

author: Xbox
description:
On this episode of the Official Xbox Podcast, we're at the historic El Rey Theater in Los Angeles, California to go hands on with Tony Hawk's Pro Skater 3+4. We'll talk to the devs about remastering the game for a new generation, new skaters, new levels, and more.

00:00 Introduction
01:19 Meet Kurt and Mike of Iron Galaxy
04:04 How Do You Know You Got It Right
05:04 General Overview
06:20 Classic Parks Remastered
08:02 Waterpark!
09:29 Old Memories, New Additions
10:45 Skaters and Techniques
13:03 Doom Slayer and Revenant
14:05 Soundtrack
15:42 Final Thoughts
16:21 Jeff Does Crime

Listen to us on Spotify/Apple Podcasts 🎧 
https://podcasters.spotify.com/pod/show/officialxboxpodcast
